TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TypeInitializationException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class TypeInitializationException Inherits SystemException
public ref class TypeInitializationException sealed : SystemException

summary.span: 因為當做類別初始設定式 (Class Initializer) 所擲回例外狀況的包裝函式，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown as a wrapper around the exception thrown by the class initializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當類別初始設定式無法初始化型別時， 便會建立並傳遞參考至型別之類別初始設定式所擲回的例外狀況。When a class initializer fails to initialize a type, a is created and passed a reference to the exception thrown by the type's class initializer. 屬性保存基礎例外狀況。The property of holds the underlying exception. 一般而言，例外狀況會反映嚴重條件 （執行階段是無法具現化類型），防止應用程式無法繼續。Typically, the exception reflects a catastrophic condition (the runtime is unable to instantiate a type) that prevents an application from continuing. 大多數情況下，回應某些應用程式的執行環境中的變更就會擲回。Most commonly, the is thrown in response to some change in the executing environment of the application. 因此，而不可能是疑難排解偵錯程式碼中，例外狀況應該不會以處理`try` / `catch`區塊。Consequently, other than possibly for troubleshooting debug code, the exception should not be handled in a `try`/`catch` block. 相反地，應該調查並消除例外狀況的原因。Instead, the cause of the exception should be investigated and eliminated. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_TYPEINITIALIZATION，其值 0x80131534。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_TYPEINITIALIZATION, which has the value 0x80131534. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. 下列各節描述一些情況下會擲回例外狀況。The following sections describe some of the situations in which a exception is thrown. - [靜態建構函式和 TypeInitializationException 例外狀況Static constructors and the TypeInitializationException exception](#Static) - [規則運算式相符項目逾時值Regular expression match timeout values](#Timeout) - [日曆和文化特性的資料Calendars and cultural data](#Calendars) ## 靜態建構函式和 TypeInitializationExceptionStatic constructors and the TypeInitializationException 靜態建構函式中，如果有的話，會自動呼叫執行階段建立類型的新執行個體之前。A static constructor, if one exists, is called automatically by the runtime before creating a new instance of a type. 由開發人員都可以定義明確的靜態建構函式。Static constructors can be explicitly defined by a developer. 如果未明確定義靜態建構函式，編譯器會自動建立一個用來初始化任何`static`（在 C# 中) 或`Shared`（在 Visual Basic) 型別的成員。If a static constructor is not explicitly defined, compilers automatically create one to initialize any `static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) members of the type. 如需靜態建構函式的詳細資訊，請參閱[靜態建構函式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/static-constructors.md)。For more information on static constructors, see [Static Constructors](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/static-constructors.md). 大多數情況下，無法具現化類型的靜態建構函式時，會擲回例外狀況。Most commonly, a exception is thrown when a static constructor is unable to instantiate a type. 屬性會指出為什麼無法具現化類型的靜態建構函式。The property indicates why the static constructor was unable to instantiate the type. 一些較常見的原因之一例外狀況是：Some of the more common causes of a exception are: - 靜態建構函式中處理的例外狀況An unhandled exception in a static constructor 如果靜態建構函式中擲回例外狀況，該例外狀況會包裝在例外狀況，以及類型無法具現化。If an exception is thrown in a static constructor, that exception is wrapped in a exception, and the type cannot be instantiated. 什麼會使得這個例外狀況難以進行疑難排解時，靜態建構函式未明確地定義原始程式碼中。What often makes this exception difficult to troubleshoot is that static constructors are not always explicitly defined in source code. 如果，靜態建構函式會存在於類型：A static constructor exists in a type if: - 它已明確定義為類型的成員。It has been explicitly defined as a member of a type. - 類型具有`static`（在 C# 中) 或`Shared`（在 Visual Basic 中) 會宣告並初始化單一陳述式中的變數。The type has `static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) variables that are declared and initialized in a single statement. 在此情況下，語言編譯器會產生類型的靜態建構函式。In this case, the language compiler generates a static constructor for the type. 您可以使用下列公用程式來檢查[IL 解譯器](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。You can inspect it by using a utility such as [IL Disassembler](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). 比方說，當 C# 和 VB 編譯器編譯下列範例中，它們會產生的 IL，就像這樣的靜態建構函式：For instance, when the C# and VB compilers compile the following example, they generate the IL for a static constructor that is similar to this: ``` .method private specialname rtspecialname static void .cctor() cil managed { // Code size 12 (0xc) .maxstack 8 IL_0000: ldc.i4.3 IL_0001: newobj instance void TestClass::.ctor(int32) IL_0006: stsfld class TestClass Example::test IL_000b: ret } // end of method Example::.cctor ``` 下列範例所示編譯器所產生的靜態建構函式擲回的例外狀況。The following example shows a exception thrown by a compiler-generated static constructor. `Example`類別包含`static`（在 C# 中) 或`Shared`（在 Visual Basic) 欄位的型別`TestClass`，具現化將 3 這個值傳遞至其類別建構函式。The `Example` class includes a `static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) field of type `TestClass` that is instantiated by passing a value of 3 to its class constructor. 不過，該值，是不合法;允許只為 0 或 1 的值。That value, however, is illegal; only values of 0 or 1 are permitted. 如此一來，`TestClass`類別建構函式會擲回。As a result, the `TestClass` class constructor throws an . 因為未處理這個例外狀況，它會包裝在例外狀況。Since this exception is not handled, it is wrapped in a exception. [!code-csharp[System.TypeInitializationException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/cs/ctorException1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TypeInitializationException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/vb/CtorException1.vb#3)] 請注意例外狀況訊息會顯示相關資訊屬性。Note that the exception message displays information about the property. - 遺漏的組件或資料檔案A missing assembly or data file 常見的原因，例外狀況是在應用程式的開發和測試環境中存在的組件或資料檔案遺漏其執行階段環境。A common cause of a exception is that an assembly or data file that was present in an application's development and test environments is missing from its runtime environment. 例如，您可以編譯下列範例來使用此命令列語法來命名 Missing1a.dll 組件：For example, you can compile the following example to an assembly named Missing1a.dll by using this command-line syntax: ```csharp csc -t:library Missing1a.cs ``` ```vb vbc Missing1a.vb -t:library ``` [!code-csharp[System.TypeInitializationException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/cs/Missing1a.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TypeInitializationException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/vb/Missing1a.vb#1)] 然後，您可以編譯的可執行檔名為 Missing1.exe 包括 Missing1a.dll 參考下列範例：You can then compile the following example to an executable named Missing1.exe by including a reference to Missing1a.dll: ```csharp csc Missing1.cs /r:Missing1a.dll ``` ```vb vbc Missing1.vb /r:Missing1a.dll ``` 不過，如果您重新命名、 移動或刪除 Missing1a.dll 和執行範例時，它會擲回例外狀況，並顯示範例所示的輸出。However, if you rename, move, or delete Missing1a.dll and run the example, it throws a exception and displays the output shown in the example. 請注意，例外狀況訊息包含下列資訊屬性。Note that the exception message includes information about the property. 在此案例中，內部例外狀況是擲回，因為執行階段找不到相依的組件。In this case, the inner exception is a that is thrown because the runtime cannot find the dependent assembly. [!code-csharp[System.TypeInitializationException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/cs/Missing1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TypeInitializationException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/vb/Missing1.vb#2)] > [!NOTE] > 在此範例中，已擲回例外狀況，因為無法載入組件。In this example, a exception was thrown because an assembly could not be loaded. 如果靜態建構函式會嘗試開啟資料檔案，例如組態檔、 XML 檔案，或檔案，包含序列化資料，找不到，可能也會擲回例外狀況。The exception can also be thrown if a static constructor attempts to open a data file, such as a configuration file, an XML file, or a file containing serialized data, that it cannot find. ## 規則運算式相符項目逾時值Regular expression match timeout values 您可以設定規則運算式模式比對作業，每個應用程式定義域為基礎的預設逾時值。You can set the default timeout value for a regular expression pattern matching operation on a per-application domain basis. 藉由指定定義逾時"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"屬性的值方法。The timeout is defined by a specifying a value for the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property to the method. 時間間隔必須是有效大於零且小於約 24 天的物件。The time interval must be a valid object that is greater than zero and less than approximately 24 days. 如果不符合這些需求，嘗試設定的預設逾時值會擲回，這又會包裝在例外狀況。If these requirements are not met, the attempt to set the default timeout value throws an , which in turn is wrapped in a exception. 下列範例所示指派給 「 REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"屬性的值無效時擲回。The following example shows the that is thrown when the value assigned to the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property is invalid. 若要排除例外狀況，請將"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"屬性設定為大於零且小於約 24 天的值。To eliminate the exception, set the"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property to a value that is greater than zero and less than approximately 24 days. [!code-csharp[System.TypeInitializationException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/cs/Regex1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TypeInitializationException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TypeInitializationException/vb/Regex1.vb#4)] ## 日曆和文化特性的資料Calendars and cultural data 如果您嘗試具現化行事曆，但執行階段是無法具現化物件，對應至該行事曆，就會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to instantiate a calendar but the runtime is unable to instantiate the object that corresponds to that calendar, it throws a exception. 下列的行事曆類別建構函式會擲回這個例外狀況：This exception can be thrown by the following calendar class constructors: - 預設建構函式類別。The default constructor of the class. - 預設建構函式類別。The default constructor of the class. - 預設建構函式類別。The default constructor of the class. 因為這些文化特性的文化特性資料應該可在所有系統上，您應該很少，鮮，會遇到此例外狀況。Since cultural data for these cultures should be available on all systems, you should rarely, if ever, encounter this exception.

related.span: 在 .NET 中處理和擲回例外狀況

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string fullTypeName, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (fullTypeName As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 初始化失敗之型別的完整名稱。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the type that fails to initialize.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，則會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用預設的錯誤訊息、特定的型別名稱和造成這個例外狀況根本原因的內部例外的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default error message, the specified type name, and a reference to the inner exception that is the root cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.| ||型別的名稱。The name of the type.|

related.span: 在 .NET 中處理和擲回例外狀況

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

Public Overrides Sub GetObjectData (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: ，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

span.span: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 。

span.span: The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 以型別名稱和其他例外狀況 (Exception) 資訊設定 物件。

span.span: Sets the object with the type name and additional exception information.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 取得初始化失敗之型別的完整名稱。

span.span: Gets the fully qualified name of the type that fails to initialize.

value.span: 初始化失敗之型別的完整名稱。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the type that fails to initialize.
